page.title: 05Shopping in Fernhurst.
page.content: { Shopping in Fernhurst. All the shops in the village are situated close to the village crossroads. Six shop premises are in Vann Rd. to the west of the crossroads in two modern blocks.At the crossroads are the Post Office,Newsagent's and several new shop premises which have been part of the recent conversion of the old village grocer's shop.These are vacant at present but are expected to open for business in late Autumn.There are two antique shops on the main road near the village centre and a furniture restorer occupies premises near the village hall.People regularly travel to Haslemere to shop at the large supermarkets in the town whilst Chichester,Farnham and Guildford offer greater facilities for shopping within easy reach of Fernhurst.
